summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD F-150. WHILE DRIVING 70 MPH, THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED ON ITS OWN. THE CONTACT'S SPOUSE WAS DRIVING AND PULLED THE VEHICLE OVER ONTO THE SHOULDER. THE DRIVER TURNED OFF THE ENGINE AND WAITED A WHILE. ONCE THE VEHICLE WAS RESTARTED, THE DRIVER MANAGED TO DRIVE HOME. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE SERVICE VEHICLE (WRENCH ICON) ILLUMINATED. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO AN INDEPENDENT MECHANIC WHO WAS UNABLE TO PRODUCE ANY FAILURE CODES; HOWEVER, THE MECHANIC STATED THAT A NEW TRANSMISSION NEEDED TO BE INSTALLED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 82,000.
